titles.title: 289 I Will Sing The Wondrous Story

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing
The wondrous
Story of the Christ
Who died for me
How he left
His home in glory
For the cross
Of calvary

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing oh sing
The wondrous story
Of the Christ
Who died for me
Sing it with
The saints in glory
Gathered by
The crystal sea

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I was lost
But Jesus found me
Found the sheep
That went astray
Threw his loving
Arms around me
Drew me back
Into his way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I was bruised
But Jesus healed me
Faint I was
From many a fall
Sight was gone
And fears possessed me
But he freed
Me from them all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Days of darkness
Still come o'er me
Sorrow's paths
I often tread
But the savior
Still is with me
By his hand
I'm safely led
